Google's use of the DART cookie enables it to serve ads to our users based on previous visits to our site and other sites on the Internet.
Google, as a third-party vendor, uses cookies to serve ads on our site.
Users may opt-out of the use of the DART cookie by visiting the Google Ad and Content Network privacy policy.

Third-party vendors do not use cookies to serve ads on our site. We are not using Google's DART cookie, which enbables serving ads to our users based on previous visits to other sites on the Internet.
